project.title: Warehouse Optimization Project
project.overview: This project will analyze and optimize ACME Manufacturing's warehouse operations to reduce material handling time by 40% and improve inventory accuracy to 99.5%. The engagement will deliver a comprehensive implementation roadmap with measurable ROI targets and ongoing support to ensure sustained improvements.

phases.name: Discovery & Analysis
phases.description: Conduct comprehensive assessment of current warehouse operations, identify bottlenecks, and establish baseline metrics for improvement tracking.
deliverables: Current state process mapping and time studies
Bottleneck analysis and root cause identification
Baseline metrics dashboard for tracking improvements

phases.name: Solution Design
phases.description: Design optimized warehouse layout, material flow processes, and technology integration strategy tailored to ACME's specific operational needs.
deliverables: Optimized warehouse layout design with CAD drawings
ROI analysis and business case documentation

phases.name: Implementation Support
phases.description: Provide hands-on support during implementation phase, including training, process validation, and performance monitoring to ensure successful adoption.
